title: Analyze 'Time of Day' Publication Performance
description: An editor wants to know if articles published in the morning perform better than those published in the evening.

tasks.description: Retrieve the publication time and total page views for all articles from the last 3 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the necessary raw data.

tasks.description: Group the articles into two categories: 'Morning' (published 6 AM - 12 PM) and 'Evening' (published 6 PM - 12 AM).
tasks.expected_outcome: The data is segmented by publication time.

tasks.description: Calculate the average number of page views for each category.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines which time slot has a higher average readership.
